trans-unit.source: Represents a control that creates a container that has a border and a header for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] content.
trans-unit.target: Representerar en kontroll som skapar en behållare som har en kantlinje och ett huvud för [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] innehåll.

trans-unit.source: GroupBox is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>, which means its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> properties can be of any type (such as string, image, or panel).
trans-unit.target: Gruppruta är en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>, vilket betyder att dess <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A>och <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A>Egenskaper kan vara av valfri typ (till exempel sträng-, image- eller panelen).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl.Header%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.Content%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.HeaderedContentControl> class.

The following illustration is an example of a GroupBox that contains a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl> and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> that are enclosed in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Följande bild är ett exempel på en gruppruta som innehåller en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>och en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>som innefattas i <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TabControl>

trans-unit.source: ![GroupBoxImage](~/add/media/groupboximage.JPG "GroupBoxImage") ## Customizing the GroupBox Control To apply the same property settings to multiple GroupBox controls, use the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: ![GroupBoxImage](~/add/media/groupboximage.JPG "GroupBoxImage") ## anpassa den gruppruta kontrollen att använda samma egenskapsinställningar för flera gruppruta kontroller, Använd den <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can modify the default <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> to give the control a unique appearance.
trans-unit.target: Du kan ändra standard <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>att ge unik för kontrollen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Mer information om hur du skapar en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>, se [anpassa utseendet på en befintlig kontroll genom att skapa en ControlTemplate](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate>

trans-unit.source: To see the parts and states that are specific to the GroupBox, see [GroupBox Styles and Templates](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Delar och tillstånd som är specifika för gruppruta finns [gruppruta format och mallar](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style.
trans-unit.target: Beroendeegenskaper för den här kontrollen kan ställas in av kontrollens standardformat.

trans-unit.source: If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application.
trans-unit.target: Om en egenskapen anges av ett standardformat kan egenskapen ändras från standardvärdet när kontrollen visas i programmet.

trans-unit.source: The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: Standardformatet som bestäms av vilka tema används när programmet körs.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in GroupBox control's default template and is set by using a .
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Visual egenskapen endast har betydelse om egenskapen är båda finns i gruppruta kontrollens standardmall och anges genom att använda en.

trans-unit.source: You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).
trans-unit.target: Du hittar en lista över visuella egenskaper i avsnittet "Ändra Visual struktur för ett Control" i [anpassa utseendet på en befintlig kontroll genom att skapa en ControlTemplate](../Topic/Customizing%20the%20Appearance%20of%20an%20Existing%20Control%20by%20Creating%20a%20ControlTemplate.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: Responds when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey*> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"></xref> is pressed.
Creates an implementation of <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Skapar en implementering av <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> för den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GroupBox"> </xref> kontroll.
